item.title: Deutsche Bank offices raided in money laundering probe
item.description: Officials searched offices in Frankfurt and Berlin in relation to "past business relationships".

item.title: Watch: CCTV captures moment mayor hit in rocket launcher attack in the Philippines
item.description: A mayor in the Philippines has survived a rocket launcher attack on his vehicle in broad daylight.

item.title: Border agents involved in fatal shooting of Alex Pretti placed on leave
item.description: As Trump and the Minneapolis Mayor spar over social media on immigration law enforcement, the US continues to be roiled by the killing of nurse Alex P...

item.title: Why an India court ruling on a 2018 deal is rattling foreign investors
item.description: Investors are spooked by an order on a 2018 stake sale and fear it could open up old transactions to tax scrutiny.
